text: Apparently the waitress quit and didn't come in for the dinner shift. The woman left multitasking actually kept up and kept everyone happy. I'm assuming it was the manager. text: I like their food. Very greasy, but convenient if you need to eat. I highly recommend you order online vs in store, as a lot of things are cheaper. For example, there's pretty much always been an online deal for large pizzas that makes them 8 bucks compared to the regular 12 dollar price.
